attributes.action: All porn sites to do thorough background checks on uploaders and their videos
attributes.additional_details: These videos tend to be under the search reference of ‘Asian teen.’ I feel Asia has appalling protection schemes in place for vulnerable children, as child pornography is actually legal to distribute in porn stores in China; It is supposedly illegal to produce despite this. I feel that if sites such as pornhub took these extra precautions then maybe these children would not be exploited. Hopefully this would deter peadophiles from forcing vulnerable children into such vulgar circumstances.
attributes.background: Sites such as pornhub allow users to upload anonymously, due to this I believe child predators have more confidence in committing such heinous acts and uploading them without concern of being caught. There is some seriously disturbing content that is disguised by a title on these FREE websites.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on websites, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
